exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: New face in the scene.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Let me guess. You want JDM parts because they look cool in videos.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Everyone wants the aesthetic. Few understand the soul.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Tell me something. What does 'tuning' mean to you?

responseOptions.text: Making a car faster. More power, better handling.
Balance. Finding harmony between all the components.
Looking good. Stance, wheels, the right badges.
I'm still learning. That's why I'm here.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Back again.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Still chasing the spirit of JDM?

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Good. Persistence matters in this world.

nudo_philosophy.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy.text: People think JDM is about brand names.

nudo_philosophy.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy.text: Skyline. Supra. Silvia. Names everyone knows.

nudo_philosophy.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy.text: But the magic was never the cars themselves.

nudo_philosophy.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy.text: It was the workshops. The midnight mechanics. The street knowledge.

nudo_philosophy.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy.text: That culture of perfection through iteration.

nudo_business.speaker: import
nudo_business.text: No replicas. No knockoffs. The real thing or nothing.

nudo_business.speaker: import
nudo_business.text: It costs more. It takes longer.

nudo_business.speaker: import
nudo_business.text: But when you install a genuine piece...

nudo_business.speaker: import
nudo_business.text: You're connecting to something. History. Craftsmanship.

events.text: Someone tried to sell me counterfeit coilovers last week. Thought I wouldn't notice.

responses.text: How could you tell they were fake?
The market is full of fakes now. Hard to trust anyone.
Does it matter if they work the same?

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: We'll see if you have patience for this path.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: JDM isn't a shortcut. It's a commitment.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Come back when you're ready to learn more.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You listen. That's rare.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Maybe you'll understand someday.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: I'll have some starter parts for you next time.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You came back. Good.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Most people lose interest when they realize this isn't instant.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Let's talk properly this time.

nudo_origins.speaker: import
nudo_origins.text: I started in the late 90s. Peak era.

nudo_origins.speaker: import
nudo_origins.text: Worked at a shop in Osaka for two years. Best education of my life.

nudo_origins.speaker: import
nudo_origins.text: The masters there... they could diagnose an engine by sound alone.

nudo_origins.speaker: import
nudo_origins.text: That knowledge is disappearing. New generation doesn't have patience.

nudo_network.speaker: import
nudo_network.text: I know people. Here and overseas.

nudo_network.speaker: import
nudo_network.text: Some specialize in engines. Some in suspension. Some in electronics.

nudo_network.speaker: import
nudo_network.text: There's a woman here... handles muscle cars mostly. American iron.

nudo_network.speaker: import
nudo_network.text: Different world from JDM, but... she understands the craft.

nudo_network.speaker: import
nudo_network.text: Doesn't chase trends. Knows what matters.

nudo_respect.speaker: import
nudo_respect.text: You know what I respect? Dedication.

nudo_respect.speaker: import
nudo_respect.text: Doesn't matter if it's Japanese, American, European.

nudo_respect.speaker: import
nudo_respect.text: If someone truly knows their craft... that transcends borders.

nudo_respect.speaker: import
nudo_respect.text: I've met builders who never left their hometown.

events.text: Just secured a set of original TE37s. 1996 production run.

responses.text: Those are legendary. How did you find them?
Nice. How much are you asking?
What makes them special versus new ones?

events.text: Quick question. What's the difference between 'touge' and 'wangan' style builds?

responses.text: Touge is mountain passes. Light, agile. Wangan is highway. Top speed focus.
Both are about going fast, just different roads.
I don't know those terms yet.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Your knowledge is growing. I can tell.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Keep this pace. You'll earn access to better stock.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Patience and respect. That's all I ask.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Not bad. You actually understand some of this.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Rare to find someone who cares about the why, not just the what.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: I'll start keeping the good stuff for you.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You've earned some trust.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Time to show you what real collecting looks like.

nudo_collection.speaker: import
nudo_collection.text: I have pieces in my personal collection that will never sell.

nudo_collection.speaker: import
nudo_collection.text: Not because of value. Because of what they represent.

nudo_collection.speaker: import
nudo_collection.text: A throttle body from a Group A Skyline. Touched by legends.

nudo_collection.speaker: import
nudo_collection.text: You can't put a price on connection to history.

nudo_connections.speaker: import
nudo_connections.text: The network runs deeper than you think.

nudo_connections.speaker: import
nudo_connections.text: I know someone who moves information. Digital ghost type.

nudo_connections.speaker: import
nudo_connections.text: Helped me trace the provenance of a rare manifold once.

nudo_connections.speaker: import
nudo_connections.text: If you ever need to know something's history... they can find it.

nudo_connections.speaker: import
nudo_connections.text: Works mostly at night. Never met them in person.

nudo_philosophy_deep.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy_deep.text: You know what I've learned after all these years?

nudo_philosophy_deep.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy_deep.text: The car is a mirror. It reflects who you are.

nudo_philosophy_deep.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy_deep.text: Patient people build clean. Reckless people cut corners.

nudo_philosophy_deep.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy_deep.text: Every part choice tells a story about the builder.

nudo_philosophy_deep.speaker: import
nudo_philosophy_deep.text: When I look at a build... I see the person behind it.

events.text: I have a lead on a complete RB26 from a BNR32 Nismo. Documented history.

responses.text: That's museum-grade. Are you keeping it?
How much and when can I get it?
Would you trust me to do it justice?

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You're part of something now.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: This network... it protects the culture.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: We keep the flame alive for those who truly care.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: I don't say this often.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You understand. Really understand.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Whatever you need. If I can find it... it's yours.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: That's what family means in this world.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Brother.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Welcome back.

nudo_legacy.speaker: import
nudo_legacy.text: All these parts. All this knowledge.

nudo_legacy.speaker: import
nudo_legacy.text: What happens when our generation is gone?

nudo_legacy.speaker: import
nudo_legacy.text: That's why I teach. Why I share with people like you.

nudo_legacy.speaker: import
nudo_legacy.text: The parts are just things. The understanding... that's what matters.

nudo_secrets.speaker: import
nudo_secrets.text: There are things I've never told anyone.

nudo_secrets.speaker: import
nudo_secrets.text: Sources in Japan. Connections to old racing teams.

nudo_secrets.speaker: import
nudo_secrets.text: You've earned the right to know about them.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: We've come a long way.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: You started as a stranger. Now you're family.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Whatever road you take from here... the spirit of JDM goes with you.

exchanges.speaker: import
exchanges.text: Make me proud.

toNudo: But let me tell you something...

responses: Installed it yet? Curious about your impressions.
Quality speaks for itself, doesn't it?
Been a while. Thought you'd forgotten about real parts.
Back from wherever you were. Good to see you.
You're becoming a regular. I like that.
Word travels. Heard you're putting those parts to good use.

referenceTemplates.purchase: Remember when you got that {item}? Quality choice.
referenceTemplates.knowledge: You knew about {topic}. That stuck with me.
referenceTemplates.growth: You've learned a lot since we first talked.

strikeResponses: Maybe you don't understand what I'm about.
We might not be a good fit after all.
strikeSystem.banMessage: I only work with people who respect the craft. Find someone else.
